text:
Park Regis Kris Kin Hotel Dubai launches amazing vacation packages Published on : Tuesday, July 14, 2015
The Park Regis Kris Kin Hotel, Dubai, has launched a series of vacation packages to help visitors as well as residents of the UAE explore Dubai like never before. Offering convenience, exclusive features, and great savings, the packages ensure a special getaway, dining out, and the option to see the emirate’s most spectacular attractions in a new light.
While ‘Stay & Explore’ package promises a unique adventure, the ‘Family Getaway’ offer gives numerous facilities so that you have a fun-filled holiday. The third package is dedicated to UAE residents who have chosen for ‘staycation.’ The ‘Weekend Break’ package is aimed at assisting them unwind with the ultimate weekend in Dubai.
Mr Scott Butcher, General Manager of Park Regis Kris Kin Hotel Dubai, said, “The packages ensure peace of mind so that you relax with the family, experience the adventures of Desert Safari or being ‘At the Top’ and experiencing 360 degree sweeping views from level 124 of the world’s tallest tower, explore Dubai’s pristine beaches, or simply shop till you drop.”
Stay & Explore
Availing ‘Stay and Explore’ package, available for AED 960, you can book a Superior Double Room and choose an adventure package – Burj Khalifa ticket or Desert Safari BBQ Dinner for two persons with a minimum stay of 3 nights. The package also offers complimentary buffet breakfast in Le Metro restaurant.
Family Getaway
The ‘Family Getaway’ package, available at AED1199, offers Superior Jr. Suite Twin Bedded Room with an option of selecting King or Queen Bed. The package includes buffet breakfast and dinner set menu in Le Metro Restaurant for two adults and two children.
Weekend Break
With ‘Weekend Break’ package, available only for UAE residents, one can enjoy staying in the Superior Room (Single or Double occupancy) just for AED499. Also avail 20% discount in the restaurants including alcoholic drinks and the option to upgrade to Superior Jr Suite for an additional AED150 per room per night.
Each package comes with a host of complimentary services including free usage of rooftop swimming pool, gym, sauna and steam rooms, free Wi-Fi connection throughout the hotel and free shuttle bus service to Dubai Mall and Jumeirah Beach Park. All the offers are subject to terms and conditions.
